item.title: Tip from a Windows Convert: Office for Mac – Excel Keyboard Shortcut
item.description: I’ve been using keyboard shortcuts for Microsoft Office on Windows for years. So here I am now using Mac Office on a Macbook Pro and still trying to figure out how to get around the keyboard.Tip of the Day – Windows Excel Alt+Enter and in Mac Office Excel keyboard shortcut is Fn+Ctrl+Alt This adds a carriage return within the current cell and its great for doing long text entry in 1 cell.
